scripts.android:dev: rm -rf android && APP_ENV=development expo prebuild --platform android && APP_ENV=development expo run:android
scripts.android:prod: rm -rf android && APP_ENV=production expo prebuild --platform android && APP_ENV=production expo run:android
scripts.ios:dev: rm -rf ios && APP_ENV=development expo prebuild --platform ios && APP_ENV=development expo run:ios
scripts.ios:prod: rm -rf ios && APP_ENV=production expo prebuild --platform ios && APP_ENV=production expo run:ios
